name: CircuitHub
headline: Electronics factory automation
description: CircuitHub is on a mission to fix rapid electronics prototyping. We are the first automated electronics factory built around a modern tech stack. We help hardware companies producing self-driving cars, satellites, 3D printers, robotics, & more to rapidly prototype electronics and get to market faster.
generated_description:
**CircuitHub Overview**

Founded in 2012 as part of the Y Combinator Batch W12, CircuitHub is revolutionizing the world of electronics manufacturing by offering an automated approach to PCB assembly and prototyping. Located in London, UK, the company focuses on streamlining the rapid prototyping process for hardware companies engaged in cutting-edge fields such as autonomous vehicles, satellites, 3D printing, and robotics.

**Mission**

At its core, CircuitHub is on a mission to enhance electronics factory automation. The vision is simple yet powerful: enable hardware developers to get their prototypes and finished products to market faster and more efficiently.

**Key Features**

1. **Automated Manufacturing:** CircuitHub operates the first automated electronics factory built around a modern tech stack, allowing it to offer faster turnaround times—81% of full turnkey orders ship within three days.

2. **Cost-Effective Solutions:** Unlike traditional manufacturers, CircuitHub leverages automation to significantly lower costs associated with low-volume prototypes and small batch production.

3. **Real-Time Data Transparency:** For the first time in the industry, CircuitHub publishes key performance indicators in real-time, providing clients with transparency they can count on.

4. **Shared Inventory:** The platform enables clients to manage over 35,000 common parts and also provides the option to stock unique components, simplifying the ordering process and reducing lead time.

5. **Efficient Order Management:** The CircuitHub platform allows users to upload PCB files directly, instantly receive quotes, and track order status—eliminating the frustrating back-and-forth usually associated with PCB manufacturing.

**Team & Growth**

CircuitHub has a dedicated team of 58 employees working to achieve its vision, ensuring a blend of technical expertise and customer service. The company's growth is evidenced by the staggering statistics: over 1.57 million boards delivered and 87.4 million parts placed.

**Why Choose CircuitHub?**

Customer testimonials flood in, attesting to CircuitHub’s quality, speed, and customer support. Clients rave about how easy it is to get prototypes made, highlighting the platform’s instant quoting, CAD file handling, and overall efficiency. This has made CircuitHub a favored partner for innovation-driven companies who want to stay ahead of the curve without sacrificing quality or speed.

**Connect with CircuitHub**

For those looking to dive deeper into their capabilities or get started with a project, CircuitHub offers direct contact options and a plethora of resources available on their website: [circuitHub.com](https://circuithub.com).

If you're in hardware development and need rapid prototyping that's reliable and cost-effective, CircuitHub might just be the game-changer you’ve been searching for.
